column5: Cozy little mother-in-law apartment, newly updated, just two blocks off of main street. Short walk or ride to all the shops, restaurants, and art galleries on main. Full kitchen, beautiful new walk-in shower, large walk-in closet, off street parking and a cooking fire pit in front. Great art and furniture from local artist and craftsmen. Their is just enough room to have a few friends or kids stay in the living room! Private backyard for pets and large shared fenced front yard. Pets $15 P/N.
